title: Writing an Onboarding Email
original_prompt: Generate an onboarding email for customers after they have made a purchase. The email should start with a greeting that includes the customer's name, express gratitude for their purchase of TikTok Verification, and provide a list of recommended onboarding steps, including Send TikTok Handle, Send all Press, and other verified social media account. The email should also offer assistance from your team and provide contact information for them to get in touch, including verificationteam@yourcompany.com and email@email.Com. Use Melky as the sign-off for the email.
input1: Dear Sarah, thank you for your recent purchase of TikTok Verification! We appreciate your trust in us. To get started, please follow these onboarding steps: 1) Send us your TikTok Handle, 2) Provide all Press materials, and 3) Share any other verified social media accounts you have. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our team at verificationteam@yourcompany.com or email@email.com. Best regards, Melky.

To ensure a smooth onboarding process, please complete the following steps: 1) Send your TikTok Handle, 2) Submit all Press documents, and 3) List any other verified social media accounts. Our team is here to help, so don’t hesitate to contact us at verificationteam@yourcompany.com or email@email.com if you need any support. Warm wishes, Melky.

Subject: Welcome to TikTok Verification!

Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your recent purchase of TikTok Verification! We truly appreciate your trust in us and are excited to help you elevate your presence on TikTok.

To get started, please follow these onboarding steps:

1. **Send us your TikTok Handle** - This will help us initiate the verification process.
2. **Provide all Press materials** - Any articles, interviews, or features that highlight your work will be beneficial.
3. **Share any other verified social media accounts** - This includes platforms like Instagram, Twitter, or Facebook, which can support your verification.

If you have any questions or need assistance at any point, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our team. You can contact us at verificationteam@yourcompany.com or email@email.com.

We’re here to help you every step of the way!

Best regards,

Melky

Subject: Welcome to the TikTok Verification Family, John!

Hello John,

We are thrilled to have you on board after your purchase of TikTok Verification! Thank you for choosing us to help elevate your presence on TikTok.

To ensure a smooth onboarding process, please complete the following steps:

1. **Send your TikTok Handle** - This will help us get started on your verification.
2. **Submit all Press documents** - Any media coverage or articles about you will be beneficial.
3. **List any other verified social media accounts** - This helps us understand your online presence better.

Our team is here to assist you every step of the way, so don’t hesitate to reach out if you need any support. You can contact us at verificationteam@yourcompany.com or email@email.com.

We look forward to working with you!

Warm wishes,  
Melky
